group_1.narration: "Isn't it too early in the season for this?"@is what I told my dad, but
since there weren't many customers,@we started cleaning things little by little.
…But, we had too much free time,@and we eventually went all out with the spring cleaning.

group_1.textCenter: Even though I'm sweeping and cleaning like usual,@my body just isn't warming up at all…
Passed down through generations of the Yui family…@Our secret techniques!

group_1.narration: Right: broom. Left: dustpan.@Surroundings: Zero Dust Movement!!@(High-Speed Cleanup!)

group_1.textCenter: I'll clean it til it shines!

group_1.textLeft: It's a kimono!
Haa～, how nostalgic…
…Ah, I see…@Tsuruno couldn't have known…
…this kimono belonged to my Granny…
It's the kimono that Tsuruno's@great-Granny used to wear.

group_1.textRight: That's amazing! A hidden treasure@handed down within the Yui family![chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100301:cheek_1][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100301:lipSynch_1] Yup, yup!

group_1.textLeft: Haha, it's not really a hidden treasure…
It really is nostalgic…
I thought it'd already been sold,@but it had been in this house the whole time…

group_1.textRight: …Hmm, but,@isn't the fabric a little damaged?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, it is…
If we repair it, I think it can still be worn…
…now then,@which shop should we take it to…

group_1.textRight: Can I borrow this kimono for a bit?

group_1.textLeft: A-Ah, you can, but…@[chara:800900:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:800900:cheek_0][chara:800900:face_mtn_ex_031.exp.json][chara:800900:lipSynch_1]please handle it carefully.
I see…@if that's the case, I know a good store.
Yes.

group_1.textRight: Thank you so much, Masterー!@I knew I could count on you!
Yachiyo-san, @you have quite the large network.

group_1.textLeft: It's not like that…
Long ago, my grandmother wore kimonos,@so there is a shop I am familiar with.
When they're finished repairing the kimono,@I'll call you.
…Ah, hello?@It's been a while, this is Nanami speaking…

group_1.narration: Thanks to Yachiyo,@the damage to the kimono was repaired,@and they even cleaned it!
I was thinking about giving back@the clean kimono to Dad, but@everyone at Mikazuki Villa suggested…

group_1.textLeft: Ohー, Tsuruno.@[chara:800900:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:800900:cheek_0][chara:800900:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:800900:lipSynch_1]Welcome…home…wait, you, that…

group_1.textRight: Hehe, what do you think!?@Does it suit me…?

group_1.narration: Everyone at Mikazuki Villa suggested that@I wear my great-Granny's kimono@and show it to my Dad!
I told my Dad that the kimono was under repair@and that it would take a long time.@On New Year's Day, I planned to@suddenly wear the kimono and surprise him!

group_1.textLeft: …………[wait:0.8][chara:800900:cheek_0][chara:800900:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:800900:lipSynch_1]*sob*…

group_1.textRight: Should…I not have worn this kimono!?

group_1.textLeft: S-Sorry…@That's not it…
It's been so long…@and I only ever saw Granny wear that once.
「Since we can't wear furisode outside@in a year like this」 she said
and then Granny laughed…@It really suits you.
I never would've thought the time would come,@when Tsuruno would wear the kimono from back then…
…haha, breaking down in tears@is not a good look for your old man…
Tsuruno, it suits you extremely well.
